data.title: Raymond Felton Player Profile, Oklahoma City Thunder
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Raymond Felton on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 28, 2005 - The Charlotte Bobcats selected Raymond Felton in Round 1 with Pick 5 in the 2005 NBA Draft. Jul 7, 2005 - Raymond Felton signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Bobcats. Jun 24, 2006 - The Charlotte Bobcats exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Raymond Felton. Jul 20, 2007 - The Charlotte Bobcats exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Raymond Felton. Jun 18, 2009 - The Charlotte Bobcats tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Raymond Felton a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2009 - Raymond Felton, previously with the Charlotte Bobcats, became a free agent. Sep 22, 2009 - Raymond Felton signed a contract with the Charlotte Bobcats. Jul 1, 2010 - Raymond Felton, previously with the Charlotte Bobcats, became a free agent. Jul 12, 2010 - Raymond Felton signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks. Feb 22, 2011 - Raymond Felton was acquired by the Denver Nuggets, along with Wilson Chandler, Danilo Gallinari, Kosta Koufos, Timofey Mozgov, a 2012 2nd round pick (GOS own), a 2013 2nd round pick (GOS own), a 2014 1st round pick (NYK own), a Swap 2016 1st round picks, cash and multiple TPEs, from the New York Knicks in exchange for Carmelo Anthony, Renaldo Balkman, Chauncey Billups, Anthony Carter, Shelden Williams and a 2015 2nd round pick (DEN own). Jun 23, 2011 - Raymond Felton was acquired by the Portland Trail Blazers, along with the draft rights to Tanguy Ngombo and multiple TPEs, from the Denver Nuggets in exchange for Rudy Fernandez, Andre Miller, the draft rights to Petteri Koponen and a conditional 2013 2nd round pick (POR own). Jul 1, 2012 - Raymond Felton, previously with the Portland Trail Blazers, became a free agent. Jul 11, 2012 - The Portland Trail Blazers renounced their free-agent exception rights to Raymond Felton. Jul 15, 2012 - Raymond Felton signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers as part of an eventual sign and trade to New York Knicks. Jul 16, 2012 - Raymond Felton was acquired by the New York Knicks, along with Kurt Thomas, from the Portland Trail Blazers in exchange for Dan Gadzuric, Jared Jeffries, the draft rights to Kostas Papanikolaou, the draft rights to Georgios Printezis, a conditional 2016 2nd round pick (NYK own) and cash. Jun 25, 2014 - Raymond Felton was acquired by the Dallas Mavericks, along with Tyson Chandler and a TPE, from the New York Knicks in exchange for Jose Calderon, Samuel Dalembert, Wayne Ellington, Shane Larkin, a 2014 2nd round pick (DAL own), a 2014 2nd round pick (BOS own) and cash. Jun 22, 2015 - Raymond Felton exercised a Player Option to extend his contract. Jul 1, 2016 - Raymond Felton, previously with the Dallas Mavericks, became a free agent. Jul 8, 2016 - The Dallas Mavericks renounced their free-agent exception rights to Raymond Felton. Jul 25, 2016 - Raymond Felton signed a contract with the Los Angeles Clippers. Jul 1, 2017 - Raymond Felton, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Jul 10, 2017 - Raymond Felton signed a contract with the Oklahoma City Thunder. Jul 1, 2018 - Raymond Felton, previously with the Oklahoma City Thunder, became a free agent. Jul 11, 2018 - Raymond Felton signed a contract with the Oklahoma City Thunder.
